about_the_game:
Welcome to NervBox, the multiplayer VR physics simulation that bends to your imagination. Join friends and unleash your creativity with our extensive suite of tools and tailor your worlds to your liking.

Interactive Physics Playground

Hop into a world where everyone and everything follows the laws of physics. Play with two-handed swords that take your whole body to swing. Ride in a shopping cart while a friend pushes you around. Everything is at your disposal for endless fun.

Getting Physical

Work together to move massive objects, boost someone up on your shoulders to get to hard-to-reach areas, or give them a high-five for a game well played. With a fully physicalized body, your presence affects everything around you - even other players!

Tools for Tinkering

Utilize the Sandbox Gun - a powerful multitool - to spawn in objects and attach anything together with simple welds or more dynamic joints. Wield this power to build dynamic battle arenas, design challenging parkour courses, or just hang out with friends while putting together new gizmos and gadgets.

Fully Loaded Arsenal

Handle an array of guns with realistic operations, mastering the art of loading, ejecting, and racking for the most engaging encounters. The melee weapons range from swords to bats, and everything has its own unique audio to fully immerse yourself in the world.

Games À La Mode

NervBox provides various gamemodes to give basic rules to a world, but everything else is up to you. From the open-ended sandbox, to Capture the Flag where you build forts to defend from the enemy team, and NervBall, a brawly, in-your-face test of skill, anything and everything goes.

Dynamic Environments

Hop into different maps, including a close-quarters warehouse, an open park set in an expansive city, and a minimalist empty space for unlimited creativity. Use them as inspiration for your creative builds, or as a backdrop for a friendly skirmish.

Multiplayer Shenanigans

Host or join a lobby with up to 8 players. Private sessions let you and your closest friends explore together, or hop into a public session and meet your new best bud.

Community-Driven Development

Join our active Discord community! Share your ideas, report bugs, and help shape the future of NervBox. Your voice matters!

Continuous Evolution

Expect a constant stream of new content and features. With upcoming mod support, you'll be able to upload your own new toys and share them with the growing community.

content_descriptors.notes: Players are able to create violent scenarios with NPCs, weapons, and other players.  Players are able to harm themselves and humanoid enemies.

Minimum:

  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, Requires motion controllers. Vive Controller Support limited.
